edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.clustering
Class ClusterObject

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.clustering.ClusterObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Positioned
public class ClusterObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Positioned

Representation of an Object identified in an image with some defined spatial position that can be clustered.

Author:
Colin J. Fuller

getCurrentCluster

public Cluster getCurrentCluster()
Gets a reference to the Cluster in which the ClusterObject is currently contained.

Returns:
The Cluster containing the ClusterObject.

setCurrentCluster

public void setCurrentCluster(Cluster currentCluster)
Sets the Cluster to which the ClusterObject is currently assigned. This operation will remove any previous assignment.

Parameters:
currentCluster - the Cluster to which to assign the ClusterObject.

getCentroid

public org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D getCentroid()
Gets the centroid of the ClusterObject.

Returns:
A Vector3D containing the components of the centroid of the ClusterObject.

setCentroid

public void setCentroid(org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D centroid)
Sets the centroid of the ClusterObject to the specified Vector3D. Any existing centroid is discarded.

Parameters:
centroid - The Vector3D to which to set the centroid.

setCentroidComponents

public void setCentroidComponents(double x,
                                  double y,
                                  double z)
Sets the centroid of the ClusterObject by its individual components. Any existing centroid is discarded.

Parameters:
x - The x-component of the centroid.
y - The y-component of the centroid.
z - The z-component of the centroid.

Increments the number of pixels contained in the ClusterObject by 1.
